edu.uga.dawgtrades.model

Interface Attribute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable

    public interface Attribute
extends Persistable
    This interface represents an Attribute describing an Item. It has a collection of methods to read/write Attribute's attributes. Attribute participates in 2 associations, where the class at the other end has a multiplicity of 1. Getters/setters for the identifiers of the one-side objects are included, as well. It also extends the Persistable interface, since objects of this class will be stored in the persistent data store.
